body_html:
Hi @rcorvus I am in the exact same position as you. I did as you said and added msys64\usr\bin to my path but am still not seeing success. Any update on this issue?

EDIT: I had bazel version 0.17. It is important to have 0.16.1 for the workaround to be successful.

Thanks,
Zach
